scripts.build: babel src/index.js --out-file index.js && babel src/lib/util.js --out-file dist/util.js && babel src/lib/get-bgm-data.js --out-file dist/get-bgm-data.js && babel src/lib/bangumi-generator.js --out-file dist/bangumi-generator.js && babel src/templates/index.js --out-file dist/templates/index.js --presets minify && babel --no-babelrc src/templates/pagination.js --out-file dist/templates/pagination.js --presets minify && cleancss src/templates/index.css -O2 -o dist/templates/index.css
